name: Zwemmer
author: Gijs Gietema
body:
Historie

The Zwemmer made one succesful voyage to the East Indies and back. On 5 January 1680, the ship ran ashore and was wrecked in Colombo. By then she was in the service of the Chamber of Amsterdam.

Beschrijving

Built: Delftshaven, 1669
Chamber: Delft, later Amsterdam

Aantal opvarenden25
Lengte80 Amsterdamse voet (22,7 m)
Tonnage80 ton (40 last)

Referenties

  • Gegevens VOC-schip Zwemmer.
  • DAS 1296.2.
